text: Ezɨ God ia mɨsevegha gɨvazɨma ia an adarazir otifi. Egha ia atrivimɨn ofa gamir gumazibar otifi. Ia guizbangɨra Godɨn gumazamizibara, egha God baghavɨra iti. Egh ia Godɨn gumazamizibar ikɨva egh an arazir aghuir a ia gamizibar gun mɨkɨmasa, ia mɨsefe. Ia faragha mɨtarmemɨn ikezɨ, a ian diagha uan angazangarir aghuimɨn ia atɨ.
